remarks: If cyclically shifting a word of length being a prime number and not of identical symbols by different numbers of positions, the resulting words are different.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 19-May-2018.) (Revised by Alexander van der Vekens, 8-Jun-2018.)
statement:
cshwshash.0 $e |- ( ph -> ( W e. Word V /\ ( # ` W ) e. Prime ) ) $.
cshwshashlem2 $p |- ( ( ph /\ E. i e. ( 0 ..^ ( # ` W ) ) ( W ` i ) =/= ( W ` 0 ) ) -> ( ( L e. ( 0 ..^ ( # ` W ) ) /\ K e. ( 0 ..^ ( # ` W ) ) /\ K < L ) -> ( W cyclShift L ) =/= ( W cyclShift K ) ) ) $.
$d K i $.
$d L i $.
$d V i $.
$d W i $.
$d i ph $.
